changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]New![/b] Reorder the novels in your library
[b]New![/b] Swipe right to delete novels in your library
[b]New![/b] Added [i]WLN-Updates.com[/i] to the search results (Experimental)
[b]New![/b] Added more options in General Settings to turn of javascript & clean pages. OFF by default
[b]New![/b] Added [b]Night Mode[/b] support to Wuxia World & Gravity Tales Novels
[b]New![/b] Use [b]Volume Buttons[/b] to Scroll up & down a chapter
[i]Fix[/i] - Images flickering
[i]Fix[/i] - Share the correct link when redirected from announcement posts
[i]Fix[/i] - Crashes & Chapters not loading on Reading Screen
[i]Fix[/i] - Crashes on novels with too many chapters
[i]Fix[/i] - Bug Fixes for reported crashes!
[b]New![/b] Added support for wordpress.com for clean and regular pages with [b]Night Mode[/b] support
[b]Fix[/b] - Chapters indexed properly
[b]Fix[/b] - Screen is kept alive on Reading Screen
[b]Fix[/b] - Option to enable faster loading so app doesn't freeze on lower end devices. OFF by default
Bug Fixes for reported crashes!
[b]New![/b] Authors, Translators, Publishers linked to find more of their works (More Information Screen)
[b]New![/b] Chapters load faster than before (1000 chaps in 4~5s)
Bug Fixes to support lower end phones and other major crashes
Initial Beta release.
